Fail-Safe Page (Properties Dialog Box)

Requires: Base Development System (Windows)

In the Project Explorer window, right-click a supported target and select Properties to display the Ethernet RIO Properties dialog box. Select Fail-Safe from the Category list to display this page.

This page includes the following components:

  • Set fail-safe values on network timeout—Place a checkmark in this checkbox to set all I/O variables to their default values when the target loses network connection.
